abstract: Fox dominated the ratings on Thursday as the two-hour season finale of “So You Think You Can Dance” attracted 9.3 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: Fox dominated the ratings on Thursday as the two-hour season finale of “So You Think You Can Dance” attracted 9.3 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: Fox dominated the ratings on Thursday as the two-hour season finale of “So You Think You Can Dance” attracted 9.3 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates. Although the audience for the reality show’s final installment of the summer was down from last year’s finale (9.7 million), the episode’s ratings were actually up slightly in the important demographic of adults 18 to 49.

headline.main: Thursday Ratings: A Night for ‘Dance’ and ‘Big Brother’
